titles.title: A bill to establish the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in the State of Illinois, and for other purposes.
Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2007
Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 110-514.

bill.summary: Land Between the Rivers Southern Illinois National Heritage Area Act of 2007 - Establishes the Land Between the Rivers National Heritage Area in Illinois. Designates the Southern Illinois University Carbondale as the management entity for the Area.
